item.title: Tapper Walks Back Calling Pipe Bomb Suspect 'White Man'
item.description: CNN's Jake Tapper issued an on-air correction after mistakenly referring to Washington, D.C., pipe bomb suspect Brian Cole Jr. as a "white man."
